title: The stars of Orion's belt are 200,000 times brighter than our sun, and winter is the perfect time to see them
description: The Orion constellation is home to some of the most luminous stars in our Milky Way galaxy.
content: The Orion constellation is home to some of the most luminous stars in our Milky Way galaxy.
